full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM SHES GONG DU 'PHO BA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA GSER GYI SGO 'BYED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029A *, ,(CES RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO KHA SBYOR GYI BRTAG PA BRGYAD PA'I RAB BYED GSUM PA, RNAM SHES GONG DU 'PHO BA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA, GSER GYI SGO 'BYED PA ZHES BYA BA, RGYUD GDAN BZHI DANG, ZHAL GYI LUNG RNAMS LEGS PAR GUNG BSGRIGS SHING, DE DAG GI 'GREL PA RNAMS LA 'DRIS PAR BYAS NAS, MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG SHAR BTZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS 'BROG RI BO CHE DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS BLO GROS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PA BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
